main event: Observation of a hot air balloon with an unusual flag attached in Crosby, North Dakota on 12/29/66.
interesting points: The object observed and described was consistent with a hot air balloon, and no unusual or unexplained phenomena were involved.
The report includes a sketch and a compass illustration, but no photographs.
The observer was asked to indicate the height of the object above the horizon and the direction it was traveling.
The observer was asked if anyone else witnessed the event and if they reported it to anyone.
The observer provided personal information such as their name, address, age, sex, and background.
sighted object: hot air balloon with unusual flag
